warframe.name: Excalibur
warframe.passive: Excalibur gains +10% attack speed and damage with melee weapons

warframe.name: Titania
warframe.passive: Titania has +25% bullet speed and rolling distance

warframe.name: Mesa
warframe.passive: Mesa gains +15% fire rate with dual wielded sidearms. +25% reload speed for one handed sidearms.

warframe.name: Frost
warframe.passive: Frost gains +25% critical chance against frozen enemies
